alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 22 at 9:11PM PST until February 23 at 6:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow possible with total accumulations locally up to one inch. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...Through 6 AM Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty west winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph at times, decreasing late tonight. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means that visibility will be limited due to strong winds blowing snow around. Use caution when traveling, especially in open areas. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.
